segment.source: Manage access to Skype for Business
segment.target: Manage access to Skype for Business

segment.source: Manage access to Skype for Business
segment.target: Manage access to Skype for Business

segment.source: Use conditional access policy for Skype for Business Online to manage access to Skype for Business Online, based on conditions you specify.
segment.target: Use conditional access policy for Skype for Business Online to manage access to Skype for Business Online, based on conditions you specify.

segment.source: When a targeted user attempts to use Skype for Business Online on their device, the following evaluation occurs:
segment.target: When a targeted user attempts to use Skype for Business Online on their device, the following evaluation occurs:

segment.source: Prerequisites
segment.target: Prerequisites

segment.source: Enable modern authentication for Skype for Business Online.
segment.target: Enable modern authentication for Skype for Business Online.

segment.source: Fill this connect form to be enrolled in the modern authentication program.
segment.target: Fill this connect form to be enrolled in the modern authentication program.

segment.source: All your end-users must be using the Skype for Business Online.
segment.target: All your end-users must be using the Skype for Business Online.

segment.source: If you have a deployment with both Skype for Business Online and Skype for Business on-premises, conditional access policy will not be applied to end-users who are in the on-premises deployment.
segment.target: If you have a deployment with both Skype for Business Online and Skype for Business on-premises, conditional access policy will not be applied to end-users who are in the on-premises deployment.

segment.source: The device that needs access to Skype for Business Online must:
segment.target: The device that needs access to Skype for Business Online must:

segment.source: Be an Android or iOS device.
segment.target: Be an Android or iOS device.

segment.source: Be enrolled with
segment.target: Be enrolled with

segment.source: Be compliant with any deployed compliance policies
segment.target: Be compliant with any deployed compliance policies

segment.source: The device state is stored in Azure Active Directory which grants or blocks access, based on the conditions you specify.
segment.target: The device state is stored in Azure Active Directory which grants or blocks access, based on the conditions you specify.

segment.source: If a condition is not met, the user is presented with one of the following messages when they log in:
segment.target: If a condition is not met, the user is presented with one of the following messages when they log in:

segment.source: If the device is not enrolled with , or is not registered in Azure Active Directory, a message is displayed with instructions about how to install the company portal app and enroll.
segment.target: If the device is not enrolled with , or is not registered in Azure Active Directory, a message is displayed with instructions about how to install the company portal app and enroll.

segment.source: If the device is not compliant, a message is displayed that directs the user to the web portal where they can find information about the problem, and how to remediate it.
segment.target: If the device is not compliant, a message is displayed that directs the user to the web portal where they can find information about the problem, and how to remediate it.

segment.source: Configure conditional access for Skype for Business Online
segment.target: Configure conditional access for Skype for Business Online

segment.source: Step 1: Configure Active Directory security groups
segment.target: Step 1: Configure Active Directory security groups

segment.source: Before you start, configure Azure Active Directory security groups for the conditional access policy.
segment.target: Before you start, configure Azure Active Directory security groups for the conditional access policy.

segment.source: You can configure these groups in the Office 365 admin center.
segment.target: You can configure these groups in the Office 365 admin center.

segment.source: These groups contain the users that will be targeted, or exempt from the policy.
segment.target: These groups contain the users that will be targeted, or exempt from the policy.

segment.source: When a user is targeted by a policy, each device they use must be compliant in order to access resources.
segment.target: When a user is targeted by a policy, each device they use must be compliant in order to access resources.

segment.source: You can specify two group types to use for the Skype for Business policy:
segment.target: You can specify two group types to use for the Skype for Business policy:

segment.source: Targeted groups – Contains groups of users to which the policy will apply
segment.target: Targeted groups – Contains groups of users to which the policy will apply

segment.source: Exempted groups – Contains groups of users that are exempt from the policy (optional)
segment.target: Exempted groups – Contains groups of users that are exempt from the policy (optional)

segment.source: If a user is in both groups, they will be exempt from the policy.
segment.target: If a user is in both groups, they will be exempt from the policy.

segment.source: Step 2: Configure and deploy a compliance policy
segment.target: Step 2: Configure and deploy a compliance policy

segment.source: Ensure that you create and deploy a compliance policy to all devices that the Skype for Business Online policy will be targeted to.
segment.target: Ensure that you create and deploy a compliance policy to all devices that the Skype for Business Online policy will be targeted to.

segment.source: While compliance policies are deployed to groups, conditional access policies are targeted to Azure Active Directory security groups.
segment.target: While compliance policies are deployed to groups, conditional access policies are targeted to Azure Active Directory security groups.

segment.source: For details about how to configure the compliance policy, see Manage device compliance policies for Microsoft Intune.
segment.target: For details about how to configure the compliance policy, see Manage device compliance policies for Microsoft Intune.

segment.source: If you have not deployed a compliance policy and then enable the Skype for Business Online policy, all targeted devices will be allowed access if they are enrolled in Intune.
segment.target: If you have not deployed a compliance policy and then enable the Skype for Business Online policy, all targeted devices will be allowed access if they are enrolled in Intune.

segment.source: When you are ready, continue to Step 3.
segment.target: When you are ready, continue to Step 3.

segment.source: Step 3: Configure the Skype for Business Online policy
segment.target: Step 3: Configure the Skype for Business Online policy

segment.source: Next, configure the policy to require that only managed and compliant devices can access Skype for Business Online.
segment.target: Next, configure the policy to require that only managed and compliant devices can access Skype for Business Online.

segment.source: This policy will be will be stored in Azure Active Directory.
segment.target: This policy will be will be stored in Azure Active Directory.

segment.source: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Policy > Conditional Access > Skype for Business Online Policy.
segment.target: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Policy > Conditional Access > Skype for Business Online Policy.

segment.source: conditional_access_SFBPolicy
segment.target: conditional_access_SFBPolicy

segment.source: Select Enable conditional access policy.
segment.target: Select Enable conditional access policy.

segment.source: Under Device platforms, you can choose to apply conditional access policy to:
segment.target: Under Device platforms, you can choose to apply conditional access policy to:

segment.source: iOS
segment.target: iOS

segment.source: Android
segment.target: Android

segment.source: Under Targeted Groups, click Modify to select the Azure Active Directory security groups to which the policy will apply.
segment.target: Under Targeted Groups, click Modify to select the Azure Active Directory security groups to which the policy will apply.

segment.source: You can choose to target this to all users or just a select group of users.
segment.target: You can choose to target this to all users or just a select group of users.

segment.source: Under Exempted Groups, optionally, click Modify to select the Azure Active Directory security groups that are exempt from this policy.
segment.target: Under Exempted Groups, optionally, click Modify to select the Azure Active Directory security groups that are exempt from this policy.

segment.source: When you are done, click Save.
segment.target: When you are done, click Save.

segment.source: You have now configured conditional access for Skype for Business Online.
segment.target: You have now configured conditional access for Skype for Business Online.

segment.source: You do not have to deploy the conditional access policy, it takes effect immediately.
segment.target: You do not have to deploy the conditional access policy, it takes effect immediately.

segment.source: Monitor the compliance and conditional access policies
segment.target: Monitor the compliance and conditional access policies

segment.source: In the Groups workspace, you can view the conditional access status of your devices.
segment.target: In the Groups workspace, you can view the conditional access status of your devices.

segment.source: Select any mobile device group and then, on the Devices tab, select one of the following Filters:
segment.target: Select any mobile device group and then, on the Devices tab, select one of the following Filters:

segment.source: Devices that are not registered with AAD – These devices are blocked from Skype for Business Online.
segment.target: Devices that are not registered with AAD – These devices are blocked from Skype for Business Online.

segment.source: Devices that are not compliant – These devices are blocked from Skype for Business Online.
segment.target: Devices that are not compliant – These devices are blocked from Skype for Business Online.

segment.source: Devices that are registered with AAD and compliant – These devices can access Skype for Business Online.
segment.target: Devices that are registered with AAD and compliant – These devices can access Skype for Business Online.

segment.source: See also
segment.target: See also

segment.source: Manage access to email and O365 services
segment.target: Manage access to email and O365 services
